name: Pedro Uziel
aboutMe: Graduated from the Technological Institute of Morelia, I have a deep passion for designing and solving complex systems with an eye for optimal solutions. My enthusiasm for problem-solving sparked my journey into coding at the age of 14, and since then, I’ve dedicated myself to continually learning and refining my skills. Over the years, I’ve tackled a variety of programming challenges and applied my knowledge to real-world solutions through numerous projects, consistently striving to find the most effective and innovative approaches.
